mapper.select: select a.mid, a.ano, c.pno c_pno,c.mid c_mid, dt.pno d_pno, dt.mid d_mid from tbl_member_auth a left join (select mid, pno from tbl_order_detail d left join tbl_order o on d.ono = o.ono where d.odno > 0 and o.ono > 0 and d.del = 'N' group by mid, pno) dt on a.mid = dt.mid left join (select * from tbl_cart where cno > 0 group by mid, pno) c on c.mid = a.mid where a.ano > 0 order by ano, dt.pno
select * from tbl_reply where rno > 0 and kind = "R" and mid = #{mid} and del = 'N' order by mid

select * from user_recommend r left join tbl_member_auth m on m.ano = r.mno left join tbl_product p on p.pno = r.pno left join tbl_product_img i on i.pno = p.pno where m.ano > 0 and p.pno > 0 and uuid != "" and mid = #{mid} and p.del = 'N'
mapper.insert: insert into recommend(user_id, item_id, value) values(#{user_id}, #{item_id}, #{value})
